NATO blames weapons system failure for an air strike that killed civilians in the Libyan capital.
In India, police in the western Gujarat state arrest Somali pirates after their boat breaks down near the coast.
In Syria, President Assad says saboteurs are trying to exploit legitimate calls for change.
In China, severe flooding claims more than 100 lives and drives hundreds of thousands from their homes.
Free of detention for the first time in nearly a decade, democracy leader Aung San Suu Kyi celebrates her 66th birthday in Burma.
Fans all over the world cheer as Rory McIlroy wins the US Open by eight strokes.
